author: wn.com
title: SCA Approves Listing and Trading Rights Issues to Raise Capital of United Insurance Company (SCA ...
text: ( Source : SCA - Securities and Commodities Authority ) The Securities and Commodities Authority (SCA) approved listing and trading rights issues to raise capital of United Insurance Company PSC through the issuance of 50 million new shares
